```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(tigris)
library(sf)
library(broom)
library(ggfortify)
options(tigris_use_cache = TRUE)
census_api_key("a16f3636406d2b544871e2ae49bb318c3ddcacba")

theme_set(theme_minimal())
theme_minimal()

census_vars <- load_variables(2010, "sf1", cache = TRUE)
```

```{r}
vars <- c(white = "P0050003", 
          black = "P0050004", 
          asian = "P0050006", 
          hispanic = "P0040003",
          units_owned_loan = "H0110002",
          units_owned_entire = "H0110003",
          units_rented = "H0110004")
#age vars men and women
#P0120003:P0120049

allegheny_data <- get_decennial(geography = "tract", 
                           variables = vars,
                           state = "PA", 
                           county = "Allegheny", 
                           geometry = FALSE)

allegheny_data %>%
  spread(variable, value) %>% 
  select(-GEOID) %>% 
  remove_rownames() %>% 
  column_to_rownames(var = "NAME") -> allegheny_data_pca
```

```{r}
allegheny_data_pca %>% 
  prcomp(scale = TRUE) -> pc
```

```{r}
pc %>% 
  tidy() %>% 
  head()
```

```{r}
pc %>% 
  tidy("pcs")
```

```{r}
pc %>% 
  augment(data = allegheny_data_pca) -> au

au %>% 
  head()
```

```{r}
pc %>% 
  tidy("pcs") %>%
  select(-std.dev) %>% 
  gather(measure, value, -PC) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(PC, value)) +
    geom_line() +
    geom_point() +
    facet_wrap(~measure) +
    labs(title = "Variance explained by each principal component",
         x = "Principal Component",
         y = NULL) +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:7)
```

```{r}
allegheny_data %>% 
  spread(variable, value) %>% 
  select(-GEOID) %>% 
  remove_rownames() %>% 
  nest() %>% 
  mutate(pca = map(data, ~ prcomp(.x %>% select(-NAME), 
                                  center = TRUE, scale = TRUE)),
         pca_aug = map2(pca, data, ~augment(.x, data = .y))) -> allegheny_data_pca2
```

```{r}
allegheny_data_pca2 %>% 
mutate(
    pca_graph = map2(
      .x = pca,
      .y = data,
      ~ autoplot(.x, loadings = TRUE, loadings.label = TRUE,
                 loadings.label.repel = TRUE,
                 data = .y) +
        theme_bw() +
        labs(x = "Principal Component 1",
             y = "Principal Component 2",
             title = "First two principal components of PCA on Allegheny County Census data")
    )
  ) %>%
  pull(pca_graph)
```
